header.title: The best fence installation company in San Pablo
bullets: FREE online tool to create your own custom quote.
Friendly, honest customer service from our Ergeon team!
Beautiful fence built by our skilled local contractors.

Yelp.description: Our old fence was falling at a 45-degree angle and was also rotten. When I reached out to Ergeon, they responded quickly and were able to set me up with a quote after a remote video consultation. Even better, they allowed me to split the project into two parts so that my neighbor and I could budget our money. I was impressed by how quickly they worked and how nice the new fence looks. Kelly and Teresita were very responsive and kind, definitely easy to work with! Definitely give these guys a call if you want quality work.
Yelp.name: Natassja M.
Yelp.title: I was impressed by how quickly they worked and how nice the new fence looks.

Google.description: We had a great experience with using Ergeon for our backyard fence installation. From the point of my initial request and all the way to the installation they were right on dot. They were very responsive to my inquiries, provided all details up front and keep me updated about the installation steps. The installers knew what they were doing. Overall I am a very happy customer.Service:Wood fence
Google.name: Oleg K.
Google.title: From the point of my initial request and all the way to the installation they were right on the dot.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
